name: Untitled Rythm Game
description:
--Controls--

Arrow Keys to Move

 Z to Select

--About--

This was my first jab at making a rythm type game. I'm actually pretty happy with how it came out, apart from the level ending/menuing process. I probably want to add more levels, but I was feeling too burnt out to throw together another short piece. This is definitely an Idea I'd be interested in maybe exploring the idea more, perhaps in 3d?
